commit message:
Add a new RecognizerIntent based on VoiceImeView +

refactor the existing RecognizerIntent to share code with the new one.
More refactoring
More improvements
Minor changes
Improve the settings logic
Refactor services to share common code
Update component diagram + small changes to app

IME: long press maps to selectAll

This simplifies deleting the complete text: long press + swipe left
(previously: n * swipe left)
Some cleanup
Fix some bugs
Update net-speech-api submodule

Add demo service + disconnect server onResults

+ refactoring
Fix NPE if WebSocketServer returned empty string
Fix NPE (regression from the previous commit)
Refactor to remove dependency on org.apache.http
Some UI improvements
Change some names
Add MAX_RESULTS settings to Voice Search panel
Some cleanup
Panel: support many actions to trigger autostart

Rename three files:

app/src/ee/ioc/phon/android/speak/VoiceImeService.java -> app/src/ee/ioc/phon/android/speak/service/SpeechInputMethodService.java
app/src/ee/ioc/phon/android/speak/VoiceImeView.java -> app/src/ee/ioc/phon/android/speak/view/SpeechInputView.java
app/src/ee/ioc/phon/android/speak/MicButton.java -> app/src/ee/ioc/phon/android/speak/view/MicButton.java

Disable combo selector during recognition

(instead of hiding as before)

+ some refactoring

Add 2 exterimental extras to WEB SEARCH:

- ee.ioc.phon.android.extra.RESULT_PREFIX
- ee.ioc.phon.android.extra.RESULT_SUFFIX

The idea is to wrap the input into e.g.:

- play INPUT on YouTube
- log((INPUT)^-1)
- ...
Some refactoring
Use isInEditMode in custom views (didn't help?)
More refactoring

Improve how SpeechInputView calls the service +

refactoring

Add isRecognitionAvailable/2

which for some reason is missing in SpeechRecognizer

Add another hidden demo service + refactoring

+ update help text

Merge pull request #40 from Kaljurand/remove_old_service

Remove old service
Some renaming
Add WAITING state to micbutton + refactoring
Raise error if ws server closes before EOS
Update et strings
Make IME Go-btn visible/pressable during dictation
